message:
The problem in the US isn't """"guns."""" It's HANDguns. HANDguns murder half of all murder victims, and over twice as many suicides are by HANDgun. Which is interesting because 1/3 of all US households have a gun, but they're used in a very small number of murders. Only 1/5 of
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
church members, etc. People who carry handguns are protecting themselves against, first and foremost, their families. The solution to gun violence, obviously as shown in the example here of Australia's dramatic drops in murder and gun murder, is NOT more guns. MORE guns is NOT the solution to gun violence!!
